english.segment1: Where the spirit of the Lord is. There is freedom. Where the spirit of the Lord is. There is freedom
english.segment2: If you're tired and you are thirsty. There is freedom. If you're tired and you are thirsty. There is freedom
english.segment3: Freedom reigns in this place. Showers of mercy and grace. Falling on ev'ry face. There is freedom
english.segment4: Jesus reigns in this place. Showers of mercy and grace. Falling on ev'ry face. There is freedom
english.segment5: Where the spirit of the Lord is. There is freedom. Where the spirit of the Lord is. There is freedom
english.segment6: We lift our eyes to Jesus. There is freedom. We lift our eyes to Jesus. There is freedom
english.segment7: Freedom reigns in this place. Showers of mercy and grace. Falling on ev'ry face. There is freedom
english.segment8: Jesus reigns in this place. Showers of mercy and grace. Falling on ev'ry face. There is freedom
english.segment9: Whatever you're burdened with tonight. Whatever you struggle with tonight. There is Freedom. There is freedom
english.segment10: Nobody is looking at you tonight. Nobody is looking at you tonight. The eyes of the Lord is moving to and fro throughout the Earth. Seeking an heart that's completely his
english.segment11: Jesus you reign in this place. Showers of mercy and grace. Falling on ev'ry face. There is freedom
english.segment12: Freedom reigns in this place. Showers of mercy and grace. Falling on ev'ry face. There is freedom
